TopicTitle: Selecting 4xAA not permanent between close and restart of the game

Articles.Content:
Settings were selected for Medium with 4xAA enabled.  Oddly it reverts to off the first time you try to confirm (are you really sure? ) but stays on 4xAA the second time you select and confirm... At least for the session.

Restart and you can see it's off b/c the intro screen craft is choppy / no AA.
yep, same thing with Audio\Music - you can set it to OFF, next time you start the game it is ON...
